DOC.brief_title: G-Step : Gemcitabine Based Small-cell Lung Cancer Treatment Elderly Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Four treatment arm plan . - GEMVIN : gemcitabine 1000 mg/m2 vinorelbine 25 mg/m2 day 1 & 8 , every 21 day - GEMCAR : gemcitabine 1000 day 1 & 8 carboplatin AUC 3.5 4 4.5 day 1 , every 21 day - GEMCIS : gemcitabine 1000 mg/m2 day 1 & 8 cisplatin 50 60 70 mg/m2 day 1 , every 21 day - GEMETO : gemcitabine 1000 mg/m2 day 1 & 8 etoposide 60 70 80 mg/m2 day 1,2,3 every 21 day For study GEMVIN combination two-stage minimax flexible design apply . For remain 3 combination ( GEMCAR , GEMCIS , GEMETO ) phase 1/2 design aim look optimal dose within Bayesian framework apply .
